name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Solutions Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering high-performing solutions in cutting-edge technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **React**. Proficient in utilizing blockchain technologies, **Web3**, and **SmartContracts** to develop innovative financial platforms. Expertise in backend system design, database management with **SQL**, and caching solutions using **Redis**. Exceptional at transforming concepts into reality through scalable services and APIs in modern architectures. Known for strong technical teaching abilities and effective communication skills. Previous successful engagements with leading firms like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
